Summary: I walked outside front door,saw 2 Craft up close.1 cigar,1 bronze disc@ 30ft/
divs: Sighting DetailsI awoke suddenly... Thouht or just knew something was going on out in front of my house.I opened the front-door,stepped outside to one disc-shaped bronze colored craft landing in the street(30ft.away) the door opened about half-way...I then looked up to see anather cigar-shaped polished-bronze craft flying through the air.It also had several round windows.With three eartlings on board.I one of the motioned for me to look up above their craft with his unlit cigar.I think he wanted me to check out the little white lights above the cigar shaped object.I also think he letting me know he wasin charge of the lights...But the the guy in front of him (in the next window forward) was doing the actual flying.Then I heard aloud noise only to look over at the other crart taking off with fire erupting from underneith it. I then relized I needed to "hit-the-deck" or I was going to be engulfed in fire still coming towards me...I ran to the shelter of my partly open sliding garage door,just managing to get it closed when I was hit with the heat from fire from underneith the second windowless craft.I at the time thouhgt that I was maybe gonna die.But,soon just got up.I noticed now it was ouite calm.I then went back up on the pourch and was shown a couple of differrant other types of "craft".More Stuff or events happened as well.I might report at another time.But I thought you may enjoy this report as is. If, any one is interested I be happy to complete this story...
